title: Winter Break Notice
content: College will remain closed from December 20, 2024 to January 5, 2025 for winter break.

title: Fee Payment Deadline
content: Reminder: Semester fee payment deadline is December 31, 2024. Late fees will be applicable after the deadline.

title: New Lab Equipment
content: New computer lab with latest hardware has been set up in Block A, Floor 2.

title: Faculty Meeting
content: Monthly faculty meeting scheduled for December 10, 2024 at 2:00 PM in Conference Hall.

title: Sports Day Event
content: Annual sports day will be conducted on December 15, 2024. Registration open till December 12.
